name: Lotos Quazar S SAE 5W-30
description: Lotos Quazar S SAE 5W-30 is the latest generation synthetic engine oil. Thanks to the Hi-Tec Protection formula it guarantees full and continuous anti-wear protection of the majority of modern engines in any working conditions. It is developed mainly to meet the requirements of selected petrol engines of Subaru cars. It is also intended to be used in passenger cars and delivery vans with petrol engines and diesel engines with or without a turbocharger, from other manufacturers.
